They served our country. Now let’s elect them to serve in Congress. 
http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1050059066842783744/pu/img/wUj9jvNf40wgpvyE.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1050059066842783744/pu/vid/320x180/W4Uk-IrPfmoVsReF.mp4?tag=5

Best night ever: Caroline’s hamster Schuyler has been lost since Friday.  Caroline has been in tears. Last night, after the debate, the girls got home at 2 am. Behind the wall, they heard scratching. We opened up the wall, and the hamster was saved!! Much joy for 2 little girls. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpuHXWVXgAAOG4K.jpg

Good morning Middlesboro! First stop of the day is a tour of Appalachian Regional Hospital’s new clinic & an employee town hall. ARH was given an HPSA designation after my visit last year, and has been able to expand because of it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DptmuusX4AAYXyY.jpg

RT @chiproytx Great night in San Antonio, TX with @tedcruz, @JoeTalkShow, and numerous friends gathered to celebrate liberty & opportunity in Texas! #TexasValues #LetTexasBeTexas http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dptwql7U0AAmibA.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dptwqk8VAAEwPgg.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dptwql1UUAES9sx.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dptwqk6VAAAsBcc.jpg

I’m excited to announce I’ll be campaigning in support of @Scholten4Iowa this Saturday and Sunday in Iowa.

Sioux City: https://act.berniesanders.com/event/rally/26
Fort Dodge: https://act.berniesanders.com/event/rally/27
Iowa State: https://act.berniesanders.com/event/rally/32

Tens of thousands of students were defrauded by for-profit colleges and left with mountains of debt—and Sec. DeVos has dragged her feet in getting them relief. A federal court has forced her to step up and give these students a path to loan forgiveness.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/education/court-allows-obama-era-student-loan-rules-to-take-effect-delivering-defeat-to-devos/2018/10/16/d1892cc8-d15d-11e8-8c22-fa2ef74bd6d6_story.html?utm_term=.e3aa5bc02538

RT @SAPoliceAssn This morning, we welcomed Sen. @tedcruz into our offices and discussed issues related to the safety of all Texans. Sen. Cruz is a strong supporter of law enforcement and notably introduced the “Back the Blue Act”. SAPOA is proud to endorse Sen. Ted Cruz for re-election. #TXSEN http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpuhKEkXUAEHT_V.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpuhKJ9W0AAKBDp.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpuhJ_tW4AEO97o.jpg
RT @TexasCruzer Senator Cruz and @chiproytx met some students from Trinity University after the watch party! #TexasDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpwFyW6UwAEv6Q1.jpg

RT @OurRevolution South Carolina: Join @SenSanders and @ninaturner this Saturday for a #MedicareForAll Rally! 

RSVP ➡️http://ourrev.us/sc-rally http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpkBX0_W0AIPkG4.jpg

Money buys influence & power in Washington – the Saudis know that better than anyone. They've spent millions lobbying the Admin & Congress. Is it any wonder @realDonaldTrump won't stand up to them? My plan to #EndCorruptionNow would ban lobbying on behalf of foreign governments. https://twitter.com/politico/status/1052368614454640641 QT @politico Lobbying firms, think tanks and investors all are coming under scrutiny over their ties to Saudi Arabia https://trib.al/QfapJuh

RT @trscoop Ted Cruz NAILS Beta O’Rourke with Texas Tribune’s fact-check on their debate!! https://therightscoop.com/ted-cruz-nails-beta-orourke-with-texas-tribunes-fact-check-on-their-debate/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpvvRfzUUAEzbns.jpg

The apparent death of journalist Jamal Khashoggi at the hands of the Saudi government is appalling. I’ve joined colleagues on the Foreign Relations Committee to seek sanctions against anyone involved in this horrific act.

Great to see you! https://twitter.com/chiproytx/status/1052558821938421761 QT @chiproytx Great night in San Antonio, TX with @tedcruz, @JoeTalkShow, and numerous friends gathered to celebrate liberty & opportunity in Texas! #TexasValues #LetTexasBeTexas http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dptwql7U0AAmibA.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dptwqk8VAAEwPgg.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dptwql1UUAES9sx.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dptwqk6VAAAsBcc.jpg

The numbers don’t lie. Excellent study by @Heritage showing that our GOP tax cuts have benefited Texans by putting more $$ in their pockets. The Democrats are wrong. Repealing these tax cuts would drastically lower incomes for families all across TX. --> https://www.heritage.org/taxes/report/taxes-will-go-every-congressional-district-if-the-tcja-repealed

Thank you to Judge Oakley for providing a briefing on the communities in Burnet County that have been impacted by the recent flooding of the Llano River. Grateful for the work he & his @highlandlakestx team have done to help our fellow Texans that have been affected by the flood. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpveewiW0AMqM3Z.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpveewnW0AE8FPn.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpveewkWwAAs3rS.jpg

Did you know we once had a Republican president who expanded Social Security? Maybe today's Republicans should listen to what he had to say about the program, instead of trying to destroy it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dpphs42W4AEtCbs.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1052260291675922433/vid/240x240/z1FRn51NvUpwOZK8.mp4?tag=8

It's official: Republicans will try to repeal the Affordable Care Act (again) if they win enough seats in November. We can't sit this election out. Health care is on the line. 
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-senate-mcconnell-policy/mcconnell-says-senate-republicans-might-revisit-obamacare-repeal-idUSKCN1MR2QE

I’m glad to hear a record number of Vermonters are registered to vote for the upcoming election. We must make it easier for people to participate in the political process everywhere with policies like automatic voter registration and same-day registration. https://vtdigger.org/2018/10/16/vermont-hits-record-92-5-percent-voter-registration-ahead-election/

Spread the word: You can register in person on Election Day in California, Colorado, Connecticut, District of Columbia, Hawaii, Idaho, Illinois, Iowa, Maine, Minnesota, Montana, New Hampshire, North Dakota (no registration), Utah, Vermont, Wisconsin, and Wyoming.

RT @NRA #TEXAS: @TedCruz is a true champion of the #2A. @BetoORourke will be a rubber stamp for Pelosi/Schumer/Bloomberg extreme gun control agenda if sent to Washington. It is critical for all Texans to get out and vote @TedCruz! #TexasDebate #TXSen #TXSenateDebate #KeepTexasRed http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/Dprem6CWkAAJB3r.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/Dprem6CWkAAJB3r.mp4

America’s housing crisis is devastating rural communities, but I have a plan to fix it. My American Housing and Economic Mobility Act would bring down housing costs for renters and buyers in rural areas – without adding a dime to the deficit. https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/rural-america-affordable-housing-crisis-urban-institute_us_5bb1fc21e4b0c7575966fb7c

Debate fact check. Beto’s attacks: not entirely accurate. Beto’s extreme liberal record?  TRUE.  Beto supports late-term abortions:  TRUE. Voted for $10 per barrel tax on oil:  TRUE. Voted against Hurricane Harvey tax relief:  TRUE.  Has multiple PACs supporting him:  TRUE. https://twitter.com/texastribune/status/1052576469363412992 QT @TexasTribune We fact checked Ted Cruz and Beto O’Rourke’s second debate here. #TexasDebate #tx2018 #txsen https://www.texastribune.org/2018/10/16/texas-beto-orourke-ted-cruz-debate-claims/?utm_campaign=trib-social&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_content=1539783187

They didn’t ask me to plug this book but I am really looking forward to reading Once and Future Worker: A Vision for the Renewal of Work in America by @oren_cass. He has been producing some incredibly valuable policy thinking for the modern economy.   https://www.amazon.com/dp/1641770147/ref=cm_sw_r_tw_dp_U_x_e80XBbJACGAH9

It’s time for the United States to follow suit. Legalizing marijuana at the federal level would make our justice system more fair—it’s the smart thing to do and it’s the right thing to do.
 
https://www.nytimes.com/2018/10/17/world/canada/marijuana-pot-cannabis-legalization.html
Be sure to check out the story from @WillWYMT @WYMT on my stop in Hazard, KY today! https://www.wymt.com/content/news/Buckhorn-Lake-among-topics-discussed-with-Sen-Paul-at-roundtable-497846811.html

While other states are making it harder to vote, I’m proud that Vermont is leading the nation by making it easier to participate in the political process. If we believe in a vibrant democracy, we need to have the highest voter turnout in the world. https://vtdigger.org/2018/10/16/vermont-hits-record-92-5-percent-voter-registration-ahead-election/

Glad Vietnamese blogger & activist Nguyen Ngoc Nhu Quynh (Mother Mushroom) was finally released after 10 years in prison. I joined many in calling for her release and will continue to push for the release of all political prisoners in Vietnam. #ExpressionNOToppression http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpwbOIWXUAAl9zU.jpg

After giving billionaires and giant companies a $1.5 trillion tax cut and blowing up the deficit, Republicans are preparing to slash Medicare and Social Security to pay for it. The #GOPTaxScam isn’t “reform” – it’s a heist, and hard-working Americans will be left empty-handed. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1052711663974133761/pu/img/Ho0J5_IqHsUx_9Cy.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1052711663974133761/pu/vid/240x240/kADOj6yK52gRBahT.mp4?tag=5

So when he makes his eloquent pitches about ditching party labels and coming together for the common good, it doesn't ring true — not even with his base. https://www.dallasnews.com/news/2018-elections/2018/10/16/3-takeaways-texas-senate-debate-ted-cruz-beto-orourke #TXSen #TexasDebate

ICYMI: My closing statement from last night's #TexasDebate in San Antonio -- please RETWEET!

Texans have a choice to make... I think we should defend jobs, defend the Constitution, and secure our borders.

If you agree, join us: https://www.tedcruz.org/keeptexasred #TXSen #ChooseCruz

RT @DLoesch Cruz civilly notes O’Rourke’s support for $10 per barrel oil tax, O’Rourke responds by calling Cruz Lying’ Ted and altogether avoiding the crux of the issue. Also, here is O’Rourke’s vote: http://clerk.house.gov/evs/2016/roll296.xml #TexasDebate #TXsen

RT @ReaganBattalion Since #HurricaneMichael hit the state of Florida, Senator @MarcoRubio has been on the road non stop traveling from county to county surveying the damage and making sure that local authorities receive the help they need to recover and rebuild. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1052408778572759040/pu/img/IzqGKqA8_414pSkI.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1052408778572759040/pu/vid/320x180/VPVY_wpy8WoFddg1.mp4?tag=5

It isn’t enough to talk tough and then give the Saudis what they want. We have to force their hand into real reforms, internally and abroad. https://www.foxnews.com/opinion/sen-rand-paul-its-time-to-rethink-americas-relationship-with-saudi-arabia-it-is-not-our-friend

Facts are stubborn things for Congressman O’Rourke.
 
At last night’s #TexasDebate, he claimed he didn’t vote in favor of a $10-a-barrel tax on oil, but the record shows he did… #TXSen

America now has more wealth and income inequality than any major developed country on earth, and the gap between the very rich and everyone else is wider than at any time since the 1920s. That is unacceptable and that has got to change. https://finance.yahoo.com/news/rich-poor-gap-getting-worse-trump-193238702.html

For several years I've voted to block arms sales to Saudi Arabia over human rights abuses & killings of innocent civilians in Yemen. This tragedy raises more concerns over Saudi actions & reinforces the need to stop future arms sales & reassess our relationship with the Saudis.

RT @trscoop WATCH: Ted Cruz gave a killer answer on why tax cuts help the economy in debate against Beta O’Rourke! https://therightscoop.com/watch-ted-cruz-gave-a-killer-answer-on-why-tax-cuts-help-the-economy-in-debate-against-beta-orourke/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DprX7DZUwAAtyz7.jpg
Vote for Democrats on November 6.

Our diversity is our power and we must embrace it in November. That's why our campaign has raised nearly $100K for Black women candidates for Congress in the last 24 hours. Chip in here to elect more Black women next month: 
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kdh-181016-black-women?refcode=tw181017

RT @RepRWilliams .@SenTedCruz and I visited the site of the FM 2900 bridge that collapsed during the flooding in Kingsland, as well as with the folks in Marble Falls. Even though this flood has been absolutely devastating to Central TX community, Texans are tough & together, we will rebuild. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dpv1VMZUwAEiUPL.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dpv1VMZUUAYxB1d.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dpv1VNUVsAAIdcu.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dpv1VNVU4AAg2DM.jpg

O'Rourke's problem is that he's trying to appeal to Republicans who generally disagree with him on the issues facing Texas: https://www.dallasnews.com/news/2018-elections/2018/10/16/3-takeaways-texas-senate-debate-ted-cruz-beto-orourke #TXSen #TexasDebate

We can create an America that works for all of us, not just the few if we stand together and fight for progressive change all across the country. Let’s have the highest turnout for a midterm election in American history on November 6th. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1052582360376598528/pu/img/EbkcK0WDiiWuH7Kh.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1052582360376598528/pu/vid/240x240/oTEy2hPme04Su0iw.mp4?tag=5

RT @hollyshansen I'm proud to support @tedcruz for #TXSen because he has the support of the National Border Patrol Council and he will secure our borders! #TexasDebate

At the @WashingtonPost right now to play Pac-Man and talk politics with @daveweigel. Tune in NOW on Twitch to watch! https://www.twitch.tv/washingtonpost http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpvPrE-WwAgjXkm.jpg

You saw last night’s #TexasDebate.

You know the stakes of this race.

Now we need YOUR help to #CruzToVictory on November 6th.

Please pitch in $5 or more now so we have the resources to WIN: https://secure.tedcruz.org/donate_tw5 #TXSen #ChooseCruz

Climate change is the single greatest threat facing our planet. On Nov 6th, we must show up at the polls from coast to coast and stand with candidates who are willing and ready to accelerate our transition to clean energy, and finally put people before the profits of polluters.

RT @GOPChairwoman I #ChooseCruz because the records of Congressman @betoorourke and @tedcruz could not be more different. WATCH and RETWEET! #TexasDebate #TXSen #KeepTexasRed DONATE to help Ted #CruzToVictory: https://secure.tedcruz.org/donate_tw5
Sen. Ted Cruz, other Texas leaders to speak at washed away 2900 bridge in Kingsland https://cbsaustin.com/news/local/sen-ted-cruz-other-texas-leaders-to-speak-at-washed-away-2900-bridge-in-kingsland

The GOP wants to try again to kick tens of millions of Americans off of their health insurance, strip away protections for people with pre-existing conditions, and spike the cost of premiums for everyone. I’ll do everything in my power to stop them.
 
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-senate-mcconnell-policy/mcconnell-says-senate-republicans-might-revisit-obamacare-repeal-idUSKCN1MR2QE

It is important for Amazon to recognize that workers' rights do not stop at the minimum wage. Raising the pay of their lowest-paid workers, while important, does not give them a free pass to engage in potentially illegal anti-union behavior. https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2018/10/17/bernie-sanders-elizabeth-warren-target-amazon-over-labor-practices/

A bunch of Wall Street firms pushed Toys “R” Us into liquidation and put 30,000 Americans out of work – without the severance pay they earned. I asked those firms why they're refusing to help the families they screwed over. https://twitter.com/WSJ/status/1052363642166042624 QT @WSJ Sen. Elizabeth Warren took aim at the investment firms that pulled the plug on a Toys "R" Us reorganization and urged them to contribute to a severance fund for laid-off workers https://trib.al/mLxQbmC

The most important election of our lifetime is in less than 3 weeks—and this week there are voter registration deadlines in many states. Please make sure you're registered & commit to vote in the #midterms this November: http://iwillvote.com http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpwWdQxXcAEFJR_.jpg

RT @AdyBarkan The other side believes we are exhausted, that we are done. 

I know they are wrong. 

I am willing to give my last breath to fight for this election. The question is, what are you willing to give? 

Join me and the League of Heroes today: https://a.cpdaction.org/page/s/league-of-heroes http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1052259771762511873/pu/img/PtvuKc0kKZ_geG09.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1052259771762511873/pu/vid/320x180/tMC1yVL-1FMwwJRT.mp4?tag=5

Anyone involved must be held accountable and that means rejecting any attempt to shield decision makers from responsibility. The targeting of a well-known journalist & critic would undoubtedly need approval from the highest levels of the Saudi government.

RT @MattMackowiak Update: 172 Texas Sheriffs have endorsed @tedcruz over @BetoORourke in the #txsen race.

This list includes 10 (!) Democrats. Our most courageous law enforcement professionals support Senator Cruz and reject Beto’s outrageous and dangerous rhetoric.

In 1981, I won my first election to become Mayor of Burlington by 10 votes. Please remember that every vote matters and you can make a real difference in shaping our nation’s future. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpwZEggU8AAZz14.jpg

I want to cut your taxes.

Congressman O'Rourke wants to raise them.

#ChooseCruz #KeepTexasRed #TXSen

This Administration was supposed to reunite all children with their families by the end of July. That didn’t happen. Hundreds of children are still suffering to this day. We must keep speaking out about this human rights abuse.

Great roundtable in Hazard, KY this morning - one of the top issues brought up was the water levels at Buckhorn Lake and how the Corps won’t extend the season. I look forward to doing everything I can to try and resolve this problem and support local tourism. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DpuLsA-UcAAM5yd.jpg

RT @realDonaldTrump Ted Cruz has done so much for Texas, including massive cuts in taxes and regulations - which has brought Texas to the best jobs numbers in the history of the state. He watches carefully over your 2nd Amendment. O’Rourke would blow it all! Ted has long had my Strong Endorsement!

Woman power
is 
Black power
is
Human power
is
always feeling
my heart beats
as my eyes open
as my hands move
as my mouth speaks

I am
are you

Ready. 

—Audre Lorde #BlackPoetryDay

the works of the flesh are...idolatry,sorcery,hatred,rivalry,jealousy,outbursts of fury,acts of selfishness,dissensions,factions...In contrast,the fruit of the Spirit is love,joy,peace, patience,kindness,generosity,faithfulness,gentleness, self-control. Galatians 5:19-23

.@LucyWins2018, @staceyabrams, @LUnderwood630, @JahanaHayesCT, and @AyannaPressley are just a few of the Black women running for office this year. Black women have consistently shown up at the polls but are still underrepresented in elected office. We can change that in November. http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/DpvV3cDW4AEAeV0.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/DpvV3cDW4AEAeV0.mp4
